document.docAuthor: Constantinescu, Ioana Cristina, Chișamera, Gabriel Bogdan & Adam, Costică
document.masterDocTitle: Redescription of six feather mite species of the genus Proterothrix Gaud, 1968 (Analgoidea: Proctophyllodidae: Pterodectinae) from the “ Édouard Louis Trouessart ” Collection

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Redescription of six feather mite species of the genus Proterothrix Gaud, 1968 (Analgoidea: Proctophyllodidae: Pterodectinae) from the “ Édouard Louis Trouessart ” Collection

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined. MALe LecTOTYPe (MNHN 26D10), 1 FeMALe PARALecTOTYPe (MNHN 21G12) FROM
Manucodia chalybatus
(J. R. FORSTeR) (CORVIDA: PARADISAeIDAe ), NEW GUINEA, NO OTHeR DATA. LecTOTYPe AND PARALecTOTYPe DeSIGNATeD HeRe.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Description. MALE ( LecTOTYPe ) (
FIGS 5A, B
, 6A–E ). LeNGTH OF IDIOSOMA 472, WIDTH 198, LeNGTH OF HYSTeROSOMA 312. PRODORSAL SHIeLD eNTIRe, ANTeROLATeRAL eXTeNSIONS SHORT AND ROUNDeD, LATeRAL MARGINS WITHOUT INcISIONS, POSTeRIOR MARGIN WITH SMALL SHARP-ANGULAR MeDIAN eXTeNSION, POSTeRIOR ANGLeS ROUND , LeNGTH 166, WIDTH 160, SURFAce WITH SMALL cIRcULAR LAcUNAe ( FIG.5A ). ScAPULAR SeTAe se SePARATeD BY 70, RePReSeNTeD ONLY BY THe BASeS IN THe LecTOTYPe . ScAPULAR SHIeLDS NARROW . HUMeRAL SHIeLDS WIDe, FUSeD VeNTRALLY WITH OUTeR ScLeROTIZeD AReAS OF ePIMeRITeS III . SeTAe cp SITUATeD VeNTRALLY ON HUMeRAL SHIeLD. SeTAe c2 FILIFORM, SITUATeD DORSALLY ON SOFT TeGUMeNT. SUBHUMeRAL SeTAe c3 LANceOLATe, 26 × 10. HYSTeRONOTAL SHIeLD WITH ANTeRIOR MARGIN cONcAVe, ANTeRIOR ANGLeS TRIANGULAR, DISTANce FROM ANTeRIOR MARGIN TO BASeS OF SeTAe h3 292, GReATeST WIDTH IN ANTeRIOR PART 140, SURFAce WITH SMALL cIRcULAR AND OVATe LAcUNAe. OPISTHOSOMAL LOBeS SHORT , APPROXIMATeLY AS LONG AS WIDe AT BASe, WITHOUT MeMBRANe, POSTeRIOR MARGIN WITH SHORT TRUNcATe eXTeNSIONS AT BASeS OF SeTAe h2 AND WITH A PAIR OF ANGULAR eXTeNSIONS AT BASeS OF SeTAe h3 FORMING LOBAR APeX AND INNeR ANGLe OF LOBeS. SeTAe h3 SITUATeD SLIGHTLY POSTeRIOR TO SeTAe h2 . TeRMINAL cLeFT V-SHAPeD, 46 IN LeNGTH. SUPRANAL cONcAVITY eLONGATe, TRIANGULAR, cLeARLY OUTLINeD. SeTAe f2 SLIGHTLY ANTeRIOR TO BASeS OF SeTAe ps2 . SeTAe h1 AT MIDLeVeL OF SUPRANAL cONcAVITY, DISTANT FROM LATeRAL MARGINS OF OPISTHOSOMA . SeTAe ps1 LANceOLATe WITH ROUNDeD APeX, 28 LONG , SITUATeD NeAR LATeRAL MARGINS OF OPISTHOSOMAL LOBeS AT LeVeL OF SeTAe h2 . SeTAe c1 PReSeNT, SeTAe h3 MISSING AND THeIR FORM UNKNOWN , SeTAe h2 eNLARGeD IN BASAL PART , 196 X 10 , SeTAe f2 FILIFORM. DORSAL MeASUReMeNTS: c2–d2 106, d2–e2 110, e2–h3 100, d1–d2 46,
e1– e2
48, h1–ps2 40, h2–h2 84, h3–h3 40, ps2–ps2 88.

subSubSection.paragraph: EPIMeRITeS I FUSeD INTO A V, POSTeRIOR eND cONNecTeD WITH ePIMeRITeS II BY TRANSVeRSe ScLeROTIZeD BANDS. EPIMeRITeS II LONG, WITH POSTeRIOR eNDS FRee. RUDIMeNTARY ScLeRITeS REPIIA PReSeNT, OVATe. EPIMeRITeS IIIA WITH STRAIGHT eXTeNSIONS DIRecTeD BAcKWARD AND BeARING BASeS OF SeTAe 4b . COXAL FIeLD I cLOSeD, cOXAL FIeLD II OPeN, cOXAL FIeLDS III ALMOST cLOSeD, cOXAL FIeLDS IV WITH WIDe ScLeROTIZeD AReAS AT BASeS OF TROcHANTeRS IV. EPIMeRITeS IVA PReSeNT, SMALL ( FIG. 5B ). GeNITAL ARcH 30 LONG, 42 WIDe, BASAL ScLeRITe OF GeNITAL APPARATUS ROUNDeD POSTeRIORLY; AeDeAGUS 134 LONG, eXTeNDING TO LeVeL OF SeTAe ps2 . GeNITAL PAPILLAe SITUATeD ANTeRIOR TO LeVeL OF GeNITAL ARcH. PARAGeNITAL APODeMeS RePReSeNTeD BY A PAIR OF NARROW LONGITUDINAL ScLeRITeS WITH ANTeRIOR eNDS TOUcHING TIPS OF GeNITAL ARcH. GeNITAL SeTAe g SITUATeD ON SMALL cIRcULAR ScLeRITeS. OPISTHOVeNTRAL SHIeLDS LONG, MONOTONOUSLY NARROWeD ANTeRIORLY, WITH ONe SHORT SMOOTHeD eXTeNSION ON INNeR MARGIN, BeARING SeTA ps2 . ADANAL SHIeLDS ROUGHLY TRIANGULAR, BeARING SeTAe ps3 . ANAL SUcKeRS 24 IN DIAMeTeR, cOROLLA MULTIDeNTATe, WITH 22–25 SMALL TeeTH. SeTAe ps2 LANceOLATe, WITH AcUTe APeX. VeNTRAL MeASUReMeNTS: 3a–4b 31, 4b–4a 46, 4a–g 84, g–ps3 32, ps3–ps3 24, ps3–h3 74.

FEMALE (PARALecTOTYPe) ( FIGS. 7A, B , 8A–E ). LeNGTH OF IDIOSOMA 600, WIDTH 228, AND LeNGTH OF HYSTeROSOMA 400. PRODORSAL SHIeLD eNTIRe, ANTeROLATeRAL eXTeNSIONS WITH ROUNDeD TIPS, LATeRAL MARGINS WITHOUT INcISIONS, POSTeRIOR MARGIN WITH SMALL SHARP-ANGULAR MeDIAN eXTeNSION, LeNGTH 188, WIDTH 204, SURFAce WITHOUT ORNAMeNTATION ( FIG. 7A ). ScAPULAR SeTAe se SePARATeD BY 120, SeTAe MISSING. ScAPULAR SHIeLDS NARROW. HUMeRAL SHIeLDS WIDe, FUSeD VeNTRALLY WITH OUTeR ScLeROTIZeD AReAS OF ePIMeRITeS III. SeTAe h1 ON LOBAR SHIeLD, ANTeRIOR TO LeVeL OF SUPRANAL cONcAVITY; SURFAce OF LOBAR SHIeLD WITHOUT ORNAMeNTATION. SeTAe h2 SPINDLe-SHAPeD, WITH TeRMINAL FILAMeNT, 136 × 9. SeTAe ps1 cLOSeR TO INNeR MARGIN OF OPISTHOSOMAL LOBeS, SeTAe h3 30 LONG, ABOUT 1/4 FROM THe LeNGTH OF TeRMINAL APPeNDAGeS. DORSAL MeASUReMeNTS: c2–d2 98, d2–e2 148, e2–h2 90, h2–h3 48, d1–d2 50, e1–e2 60, h1–h2 58, h2–ps1 40, h1–h1 56, h2–h2 102.
